name: No Sweets For You
description:
This is a very short game,  made for the MadeWithVisionaire #1 game jam in 2018 with Visionaire Studio.

Strange things happen on a halloween night when a scarecrow gets hit by lightning:

Our hero's friends vanish all of a sudden, the world turns black and white and - worst of all! - the sweets are gone!

This was the first jam game I ever made. I couldn't finish the game in the two weeks time of the jam, actually I needed two more. But it was a good feeling to have made a game - short as it may be.

Controls:

leftclick - use / talk / pick up

rightclick - look at

English or German texts (not voiced)

ESC - menu (no save or load)

The downloadable version is for windows only.
